overview: Jamie owns a sightseeing and tour company in the small town of Cooperville, New York. Navigating the holidays with enthusiasm is trickier for Jamie since her husband Matt passed. Matt loved Christmas and found unparalleled joy in giving to others. While reminiscing with family, Jamie realizes the town desperately needs someone with Mattâ€™s genius for thinking of the small gestures that bring genuine happiness to the holidays.
title: A Kindhearted Christmas
